The restaurant has a very good staff. The food is off the chain and they played good music videos on the projector screen. The staff knows their stuff and can describe what sauces go best with each meat. The drink menu is pretty good as well.

The best Korean BBQ place I've ever been. Their complimentary side dishes are great to start with. We ordered seaweed salad, chicken karate and Calamari as appetizers and they are awesome. All the meat and veggies are great. Bulgogi is a must try.

I yelped this place to satisfy some craving for good Korean food. I have to say, it ranks up there with good spots in LA. Good cuts of meat and very reasonable prices. Happy hour specials are of very good value too. Will return for sure when the Vegas buffets get boring.

This place is more for western taste buds.  The spicy pork and bulgogi is super sweet.  The banchan isn't so good, and not too many choices.  For non AYCE KBBQ, I would recommend Honey Pig.  Good meat, lots of banchan, and they cooke a fried rice for you at the end.
Fantastic! Our first meal in Las Vegas! Many choices provided in the combo and the meat are really great!

Great food and it was fun to cook it.  Definitely try the Korean Prime Kalbi.  We got a little bit of everything.  My brother got the bibimbap and it was the best bibimbap we have ever had.  We will definitely come back.
Cool atmosphere. Friendly staff. And if your willing to pay extra, they offer "Kobe" type beef! Yum Yum!!!
ODELL BECK ! that's was our cool ass server. He took care of all our friends and make our experience really good. I would go back to this place because of him. ODB!

The food here are pretty good. We ordered sea food noodles, spicy ramen and soft toufu, all taste  really "Korean". The service here is very nice and the environment is good. One of my favorite Korean restaurant in Las Vegas.
Clean atmosphere,  convenient location when you have a Korean BBQ craving while traveling to Vegas.

Great service, great food! 
Server Hyelin was so nice and friendly. Servers Raeyong and Yohan were informative and provided fast service. 
What I love about the most is that they surely dont joke around with their portions.

I want let you know this is really recommend for all ages.
Great services
Great food
This isn't all you can eat but you can add.
Anyway the meat is excellent.
We got ordered the gangnam and the meat lover.
They are delicious. We will come again

I have been here for three times now and I believe that this is the best korean food in Vegas! I ordered pork belly and korean prime Kalbi every time! My friends loves the sukiyaki noodles a lot. We never have something similar. It's amazing.
I want to try more vegetables in the future.
First time here, second time ever getting korean bbq...this was great! Delicious, decent price, clean, and nice atmosphere...if I get a craving for korean bbq again, I will be coming back here!

Great service, delicious and fresh food (e.g. the squid in seafood pancake was supreme tender and fresh).would definitely return,but come earlier or.later to avoid the prime time. Only 11 regular tables so easy to end up with an hour wait. Totally yummy and worth it though!

Had an absolutely great time at the Gangnam Asian BBQ.  Food was plentiful and tasted great.  My wife and her family (all from Korea) loved the place.  Our waiters did a great job taking care of our group and really seemed to enjoy working there.  We will definitely be back!
Excellent food. Got the combo meat lover for two. The meat is high quality and good variety.

We like this BBQ restaurant. It's traditional Korea BBQ. We love their grill beef. Good service. Price is reasonable. Compared with the buffets in Las Vegas, we love this restaurant. It's the second times we came here those days. We will bring more friends come here next time.

This place has an unbelievable happy hour for food and drinks. We ordered three of their appetizers each and it was way too much food for us to finish! Service was fast and helpful. And I'm a huge fan of the Korean pop music videos they have playing on the wall. We will definitely be back... and with more friends next time so we will be able to finish what we order!
The Spicy Chicken with Lemon sauce was delicious!  As was the asparagus.  Definitely worth many return visits!
Nice place with good food! Decor is fun and the server was also friendly :) would recommend

Never have I been so satisfied with Korean BBQ for so little. My boyfriend and I are visiting from Calgary, AB and we've just had the most wonderful experience ordering off of the happy hour menu. Our server was so friendly and just the right amount of attention. 

Shout out to the person who creates the video playlist as it's super awesome and spans the usual top 40s, KPOP, JPOP, and my fav Boi Drake. 

If you're feeling the late night munchies, Gangnam'a 10-close happy hour's your best bet. 5 stars.

The food was great; we consider it one of the best Korean bbq places in Las Vegas. The price for barbecue for two was extremely reasonable considering the amount of meat that was given. Can't wait to come again!
Food was delicious I recommend the Flat iron garlic and the Korean prime kalbi. The environment was great and super fun and modern. Very good service too everything came quickly.
Best meal ive ever had in vegas....if youre looking for great korean bbq, this is the place to be.
Fun atmosphere. Great Food! Get the poke seaweed salad and Harami Miso beef. Busy for a Monday, but great service once we got seated.
Good food. Nice service. Sucks how the management makes the restaurant open on thanksgiving until 1.
Didn't expect any good BBQ place in Vegas but this one is awesome. I went with my friends and we have party of 6. So they have as two separate table. Good value and good food. Yummy!!!
highly recommon... low price and good service. Amazing and fresh beef rib. I had a wonderful lunch here with my mom

Second time visiting, another wonderful experience! The preselected menus for 2 or 4 people is almost too much food, but nice to have a variety. Good option for your first visit. Recommend ordering individual dishes and order more if needed. Bulgogi bibimbop rice dish is a MUST! Let it get crispy before digging in. The harami miso is also to die for! It's worth the walk from the strip! Come during off hours for no wait (we came at 4pm).
Great service and delicious food. The Harami  Miso and Korean Chicken Fondue was amazing!
The marinade was incredible! So much food but I couldn't stop eating. Everything down to the salad and asparagus was perfect!
Would definitely come back.. Meat was marinated very well and meat was so juicy and melts in mouth
What a find! Delicious and absolutely filling! A family of 3 shared the Las Vegas and it was more than enough food and fun to cook. We will be back!

It is my first time to Vegas. I really do not like the buffet here because they almost have the same taste. But this new gives me another feeling and the taste here is really great. Strongly recommend.

A cool experience for Westerns who lack experience of authentic Korean fare and seek a hip introduction, but way too sweet in terms of sugar in the beef, sugar in the rice, sugar in the kimchi and other banchan.
We've been here twice a day and had las vegas menus. It has awesome food and service. :)
Fantastic service. Staff was very outgoing and helpful with the process. Great experience and would love to come back next time I'm in town! Dynamite shrimp was my favorite dish.
The Korean Prime Kalbi and Kimchi Chigae is a must and Salmon carpaccio is good too. Love the food so much, Felt like when I was once ate in Korea
Really good Korean BBQ. The bulgogi was the best. Also the spicy lemon chicken was very tasty! Highly recommended.

Got there right at opening time and had no problem getting a spot, then it quickly filled up.

This is my first experience at korean bbq-ing and it was-- AMAZING. Service was good, as was food. Wish there was one back in utah!

My friend and I ordered "meet lover" combo, which was great! If you had too much American and French food in Las Vegas, this restaurant is definitely a good place to take something different! Reasonable price, not big but nice place and good service. Recommended!
Best Korean food I've ever eat in the U.S. BBQ set is awesome, good price, good service.
Food was great and the service was even better. Affordable prices for good quality food. Back was an awesome server, definitely recommend sitting in his section. Will be back!

THEY WERE FANTASTIC! 

My best friend and I were in town on business. We got in late and wanted something to eat that was REALLY GOOD but not far from our hotel! 

This place was literally a block from our hotel. 

We were greeted immediately and seated. 

Everything we ordered was so good! We had the Marinated Beef Kolbi, Spicy Tofu Soup, Pork Belly and the Seafood Pancakes.

I love this place, not only because the food was AMAZING but also because it was very cheap! 

KUDOS!!!

It tastes really good here! Especially pork belly! Everyone must try!
Cannot wait to try other food and desserts next time! I can say this is the best korean bbq restaurant in Vegas!
Great Korean BBQ, not far from the strip.  Had the meat lovers for 2 and was a lot of food.  Great Happy Hour 3-6. Come hungry
Really good variety and the meats were excellent quality.  The yuzu drink is highly recommended.

Food was average at best. The low rating was for the horrendous service and bogus 18% gratuity (for a group of 4) at a restaurant where you cook your own food.  We had to constantly get the attention of our servers because they never checked up on us.  Any request we made had to be asked at least twice before thy actually fulfilled it.  We were finished with our meal for 20 minutes and nobody stopped by until we got the attention of one of the servers and asked for check.  Then after submitting my credit card, I had to wait another 15 minutes to get it back.  I'll reiterate, the service here is awful and I will not return.

Perfect place for a late night meal after a 5+ hour drive from CA to the Vegas Strip!  The restaurant has a relaxing ambience with efficient service from a very courteous and attentive staff. The tables and grills are spacious, especially for our party of five. The  items we ordered were served quickly and with great pacing. Everything was delicious! And we had the good fortune to see Mr. Carrot Top here :) can't wait to come again!!

After a hard workout I needed some excellent swoll food! Absolutely incredible food and great freindly, speedy service.  Support my page here...
Facebook.com/DAVIDGREENMMA
We ordered a meat lover set menu, it is really delicious and enough food for two persons, table is clean. And I also liked the side menu which is really good for my taste.
We orded the ramen. It tastes like instant noodles but delicious. Also the Korean prime kalbi is soooo delicious. Nice try! We will come next time!
Amazing food! The Harami Miso, Korean Chicken Cheese Fondue and Salmon with bacon were fantastic. Will definitely visit again!

First thing when you walk in, you smell how good the food is, second is the service (which is friendly and helpful (she asked us before she left if we wanted anything to drink).

Restaurant was nicely packed, but wasn't overcrowded. Loved the K-Pop music videos playing on the TV projector.

Food was great and came very quickly. Loved the free dishes of appetizers and the steamed egg was tasty. 

Overall, I would definitely come back when I'm in Vegas again.

Came here for a Memorial Day weekend dinner and had no complaints. The beef was tender and juicy. The servers were pleasant and helpful. The wait was not too long and the ambience was perfect. A perfect place to get your carnivore needs satisfied. Plus free dessert for yelpers!
I love the steak and marinated galbi!!! Awesome kbbq!!! The side dishes are also good!!!
Awesome food at Gangnam! First time ever trying Asian BBQ and we loved it!! Especially loved the bibimpap

Food is good!excellent service,five stars!. Was here with my friends post basketball. Luckily we made it to the happy hour menu and it was the best. Got the calamari and bulgogi bibimbap. Sooo good.. First time to have that and i think i know what to get everytime i go here.
The best korean BBQ in Las Vegas. Good service too. I will definitely come back again.

The BEST KOREAN BBQ I've ever had! It's not all you can eat but you don't need it. The portions are sooooo huge. Salads and sides are more than enough. Get the Meat Lovers!!! Sooooo awesomely delicious!!
Great food, awesome people! We walked here from the hard Rock hotel. Will come for sure any time I come to vegas! The bokogi was amazing. Good prices too!

Clean and modern. Not very busy late nite off the strip easy parking in strip mall toward back. Good smells. Half price menu after 10pm. No Korean barley tea. Pork overdone in kitchen tried to spare the servers of cleanup for one person. Beef also cool ok marinade. Kimchi excellent as were the other Namul. Cukes, chili and radish,shredded dried fish, bean sprout, fish cake. Chap chae was quite good. Paid bill. Came back in one hour because my cousin was hungry so I brought him here. Happy hour continues. Noticed a note the new table offering dessert for a Yelp review. I had already done one. Waiter kindly offered dessert of fried banana and ice cream. Cousin enjoyed sukiyaki. It smelled good. He also ordered chicken salad. He was too full to try it. Overall good experience but just not the "best" in the Korean experience. I would still recommend for price point, happy hour, and location and parking. Not a bad thing.
Great Korean bbq  definitely would come back here again!! I'm from Arizona and I love this place so much!!! The gangnam plate will fill you up either for 4 or 6 people
Saw the reviews and had to try it for myself. Yes, this place is great!  Good service, friendly staff, and delicious food. Will definitely come back again.
This Korean bbq place is the best I have try so far. Very good and fast service . You also have free lava cake if u write a review
Pretty good restaurant, nice meat. I take off one star because there's no free lettuce for the wrap :(

In town for a convention.  Went out with a co-worker we were looking for some variety, liked the name and reviews close to our hotel.  Split the Las Vegas for two perfect selection, soup salad and fun variety of meats to be cooked.  Two types of chicken, then sampling of Shrimp as well as a good sized  portion of sliced beef.  We were able to eat it all and left totally satisfied.  When looking for something different perfect option.  One wall has music videos we got in early with no wait it was filling up by the dinner hour.
Nice environment. Great food. Wonderful service. We tried seafood noodles. It's taste so good!
I really enjoyed eating at Gangnam! It's my favorite kbbq. The original bibimbap is amazing and the meat are great!
Was craving some Kbbq so we came to check it out~~~ must say one of the best in Vegas so far!!!
Best bbq in town!!! Highly recommended.... I love Korean prime Kal I and beef bulgogi. But don't forget the sangria.. So tasty!

Great service! Great food and the super clean restaurant. The staff was so attentive to our needs. The food was delicious ! I had had the bimbim bop and it was perfect.  The appetizers were small dishes with different types of kimchi. There was something for everyone's pallet .Will come back and revisit, when my husband and I come back to Vegas.
this restaurant is really good and the appetizer is also very delicious! Recommend to come and try
Great food and service. The bulgogi is very tasty and the skirt steak is delicious. Looking forward to coming back again.

This place is so good. We came for happy hour and had dinner and the prices were also great. The Korean prime kalbi and the bulgogi were our favorite but everything was amazing. I'd never had cucumber kimchi before and I really liked it.

this is really a recommended Korean bbq!!! Pork belly, enoki with bacon, Harami miso are the ones you must try! And kimchi bibimbap is really good and with large quantity. We four can share one bibimbap. And the servers are pretty nice!

Wanted some Korean BBQ and found this place on yelp. We ordered Gangnam combo for four and everything was more than great! The oyster was more fresh than those in the Caesar's Palace buffet. A must try!

Gangnams is a very tasty and authentic Korea restaurant. As a meat lover I highly recommend their meat lover serve. Fancy cut with well-cooked meat.  W a party of 5, we ordered a 4-people combo w/some sides. If you are around and want some Asian taste, come and try here.
Very good BBQ atmosphere and excellent Sause with meat!

Vising Vegas all the way from San Diego. Ate some good bbq, the prok belly and the bulgogi was delicious. Great marination and flavor, broke da mouth as we say in Hawai'i. Love to check out local food places that are not on the strip.
We were looking for Korean BBQ for a while now. So glad there's one here in Vegas. Service staff is friendly and we love the juicy beef.

This Korean BBQ is an outstanding rendition.  This is my second time here.  Just as good as the first.  Outstanding meal.  Consistent.  Rich flavors.  High food quality.  Good service.  Plenty of food.
Expect to smell like Korean BBQ leaving, but the food is worth it!  There is a variety of meats, well marinated.  Food came out fast and staff was friendly.

Best Korean BBQ  in Las Vegas!  They have combo for 2 or 4 with cheap price! U can refill the side dishes many time as u want! The services here are nice too! Especially a guy he"s very handsome and cute!
Great food! Great for groups. Cool environment with music / music videos and stays on n late.

Very reasonable prices, top notch quality, hands down the best Korean BBQ in Vegas.  Worth the visit, just a short drive from the strip.  The Beef Toro and the Pork Belly are great.

The decor and service are outstanding.  This is definitely a place you will visit more than once.
Very fast (perhaps too fast?) Service. very friendly. Excellent quality of food, a plethora of sides, good prices and long happy hours. Everything I was hoping for in Korean BBQ.
Nice little joint across the Hard Rock.  They have delicious appetizers and their meats is marinated to perfection.  It's worth the drive, since it's by the airport.  Highly recommended

Came here over 4th of July weekend. Most of the meat was excellent and well flavored including the marinated Kalbi. The brisket (beef toro) was only alright. Most of the staff was friendly although it took awhile for anyone to notice we were there and seat us. Overall I will probably come back eventually.
The place had a very nice vibe to it. The food was really good, filling and cheap. Coming back for sure.
Amazing food. Wanted something off strip and tried this place on a whim. Was not disappointed!

Absolutely amazing food. GREAT happy hour! My husband said this is the some of the best food he has experienced. The experience alone is something to write home about. There is a grill at every table where you get to grill your own, already seasoned meats, Korean style! Sooooo GOOD! I would definitely come back again. I will also be recommending this place to everyone I know who are visiting Las Vegas. Thank you for a wonderful meal.

If you love Korean food or even if you've never tried it, you have got to go to this quaint small restaurant.  I have had Korean bbq in several states and this is awesome. Stop by if you're looking for something really good.  The service is very good  also, very friendly staff.
Very pleasurable experience! Jin thank you so much you are awesome! Thank you for welcoming us and guiding us step by step since it was my first time here ! Thank you.

Hands down one of the best KBBQ I've been to.

Service is great. The waitresses are around but not hovering. 

Food.. MMMM! We liked everything we ordered. Spicy Tuna, Kimchi Pancake, Kalbi, Bulgogi, Spicy Chicken with Lemon Sauce, & Pork Belly... Super filling between 3 people! 

And their rice is HUGE! Well worth ~$2! 

Super delish...

So good! The service was quick and we ordered the bibibamp(my FAVE) spicy chicken,bulgogi,filet Minot,calamari and tofu soup. Everything was above average and even the side dishes were tasty. I especially liked the dried squid in the side dishes-very unique from other kbbq places. I would definitely recommend
Great food and service! Loved it! It's super fun to cook your own food. The meat was delicious and the kimchee was awesome! We will come again!

This place was soooooooooo delicious. Service was a bit lacking towards end of our meal so only reason why they don't get 5 stars. It gets busy so go early or expect a wait. Totally worth it. I can't stop talking about this place,  I would absolutely go again and would recommend it to anyone.

Visited here last week and the food and the quality was pretty good.  The only complaint I had was there rice cake in spicy sauce was really good, but they really need to give more on the main ingredient! Rice cake!
Hands down the most delicious Korean bbq your little tongues will ever taste. Stop reading reviews and go there now! Now I said!!!

After hiking at the National Parks in Utah, this was just what we needed. We came during happy hour and received 50% off of our cocktails. The meat was flavorful and we received large portions. The side dishes were also delicious!

Stay away... The people are so rude!!! We just got up and left as all the tables that came in after us were being served.  The gentleman finally took notice that we were standing at the register to find out why we weren't being served.  His excuse was that they just forgot about us!!!  What 2 people sitting in the middle of the dining room with tables all around us being served and us just sitting there!!  Get your act together!!  I would not recommend this place to my enemy!!  Kind of odd that we were the only Caucasians in there and every other table in there there were Asian,  they certainly were being catered to!!!  Very disappointing!!

I ordered meat lover and side dishes. I love Bulgogi and pork belly. The side dishes are so good. I really love kimji, bean-sprout. I really recommend the meat lover set. If more accompany, I really recommend you guys to order premium grill set b/c there are scallop and shrimp also
Tasty Korean food with good service. The place is a little smokey but that makes it feel more authentic like a real meat place in Korea.

This is the best Asian BBQ I've eaten at in the US. I've tried many in Korea and Japan and this one is excellent. The meat is all tender and flavorful. Lots of excellent side especially the oysters. Don't pass this up on a Las Vegas trip.
Food is delicious, fun atmosphere! Kalbi beef is very good. The noodles came it very hot and were also really good. A ton of flavor in all of the dishes.

Excellent service, food was amazing and ambiance was very enjoyable. I recommend going during lunch time, not crowded at all. Plus there is happy hour special from 3-6 including some food and drinks. The best part about the experience is cooking your own food, but don't forget it like I did occasionally  I recommend this place and I'm planning on coming back hopefully soon.
Great place for lunch or dinner. BBQ dishes are perfectly marinated and  seasoned, great variety of starters. Good service.

I love this place. The food was fresh and high quality, the beef and pork were very soft and tasty, even the sides such as kimchi was so good. The price was acceptable, the service was professional since they were very organized and their movements was so quick in order to serve a large amount of customers who were waiting outside. My family came here twice, and we had to wait around 30-45 minutes, but it was worthy. I would recommend for everyone to come here at least once to try it.

Loved the food..the happy hour specials are worth it....loved the ambience and service too..we got seated as we entered and our server was very patient with explaining the cuts and the seasoning..will definitely visit this place again when in vegas..
First visit at this place. All experience is good. Food is great. try their Kobe style beef. Which is very tender and delicious. Also service is very friendly too.
Amazing kbbq. The marinated kalbi is to die for! If you're lazy like me feel free to get them to cook it for you.
Yum yum yum! First time enjoying Korean bbq and it was delish here! Also Really good vegetarian options and great service! Fun dinner out! Would def come back!
Food was amazing...If one wants to try out authentic Korean food... Then gangnam BBQ us the place to come...Even the ambients looks good....

Wait for an hour for seats but I guess it's worth it. Service is fast, meats are fresh. We were planning to order 2 people package but end up ordering the individual dishes. We ate what we like, got full, and paid the same amount.

Went here for the first time and it was great! 
Dining experience - 5/5 I mean it's KBBQ/Yakiniku style so you cook everything yourself which is always fun and awesome because you can control how you want your beef/steak done 

Taste- 5/5 they have a variety of meats/seafood/vegetables you could throw on the grill including Kobe style beef which just melts in your mouth

Cost-4/5 not bad the only pricey item was the Kobe style beef which is ok, could be a little cheaper (comes with 5-6 slices=$21.95) they also catch you on the little things you'd expect to be included with your meal (sauces, rice, etc. they do come with complimentary small side dishes like kimchi, mac salad, etc.) 

All in all it was great! Also if you were to write a Yelp review you get a free desert!
First time here and I'm impressed. The overall vibe of the restaurant is great and the staff is very friendly. Most definitely will recommend to friends!
Great food and great experience! We really enjoyed our Gangnam Combo for lunch. Also had the salmon and fried rice and loved it all.
This place is so yummy had a great stay was fun ate a lot of BBQ not to expensive and was a great atmosphere for everyone
sooooooooooo goooooooooooooooooooooood. tons of awesome banchans, fresh meats, and the dipping sauces are great.

The best Korean BBQ in Las Vegas.  We ordered their most important combo for 2 and it was worth every penny.  Kobe beef and Kobe carpaccio was delicious.  Would definitely come back when we are in the mood for Korean food.
Love the food!!! Big portion tender steaks and all the sides dishes were tasty and delicious.  Definitely come back again

Got here very hungry. Loved seasoned Galbi and pork belly. Kimchi soup was awesome. The portion is a bit small but reasonable priced.  Actually I liked it because it allowed me to try different dishes. Great place and I will definitely come back while I stay in Las Vegas. Tip! Come before dinner time. The line gets really long.

So glad we decided to come out to Gangnam for my birthday. We had a party of 8 and we were seated in the private room. Supa legit meats, marinades, spicy ahi salad, veggies. Food & customer service  everything was awesome! Jin is the best and he didn't miss a beat. Definitely returning!
Great place to go with friends.  Definitely recommend. But there would be lots of people waiting if no reservation.
10/10 would eat again. Great selection to snack on. Food was fresh and you can taste the BBQ flavor. The side dishes were incredible, best, richest kimchi I have ever had.
The BBQ is excellent ?? Best recommend the Kobe Beef and the Best Seller .The service is good too ??
We came here after a long day of traveling. Ate pretty much one of everything and could not have enjoyed it more! Take a taxi, limo, or just walk to Gangnam. It's delicious!

This place is the bomb yo!



Lots of meat for a great price. Drinks are also well priced.
We ordered las vegas combo, great for two  people.So nice and friendly, Very good place for dinner!
C'est incroyable! Les poullete epice est tres bonne! Lovely atmosphere and friendly wait staff, but the food here is the shining star!
First time at Korean BBQ so don't have much to compare it to but the food was amazing! The mango kochi desert was the best I've had. Highly recommend.
??????yummy?yummy?????????? ?????????????????????????????????????very delicious! And the Korean waiter is so handsome!
An excellent way to start a vacation in Vegas. Probably the best menu of food I've ever seen. I'll definitely be back next time I'm here.

I'm a big fan of Korean food and this place was awesome. Our first time and it did not disappoint!   Very high quality meats...especially the Kalbi and bulgogi.  The bulgogi was actually the most tender and tasty I ever had!
This place is wonderful! The food is full of flavor and the service is outstanding! Get the meat lovers on your first visit you can't go wrong.
food is good. I love it. The happy hour beer is good too and the price is acceptable. Nice restaurant and nice meat. Love Vegas.
Fun experience (you grill the meats at the table). Food and service were both good. I would recommend the harami miso skirt steak. I'm definitely curious to try a few other meats on the next visit.
Very yummy and Delicious food. I loved their service !!!  Most definitely Enjoyed the cooking with family and friends. Definitely coming back! I cant believe how delicious the meats are!
We had a reservation at 9. I heard they might not accept walk in customers sometimes. It's better to reserve online! Great BBQ experience! Recommend steak! The environment was good!

All the reviews here said there was going to be quite a wait and they were right. The wait was about 1.5 hours when we got here at about 7. The man at the front was very helpful and polite when I kept asking him how much longer. 

We had never been to a Korean bbq before so we had a little trouble with figuring out how to grill the meat. The chef came out to help us multiple times and told us when to flip the meat and how to arrange the meat on the grill. He also came and cut the meat for us when he realized we were struggling a little bit with eating it. All the staff were extremely friendly and the service is very speedy.  The waiter came and checked on us multiple times and refilled our water constantly 

We started our meal with the edamame which is a great way to offset the oiliness of the meat. The meat was so juicy and tender. I wanted to splurge a bit and get the kobe which was pretty expensive but it was definitely worth it. We ordered almost every one of the bbq beef options and they were all delicious in their own way. My favorite was the pork belly and the Kobe. 

The portions are reasonably sized for their price, and it's a little pricy but at the end of the meal I definitely felt that it was worth it. Don't forget to get that free macaron ice cream by checking in! It was a nice way to end the meal.

I've been to a few Korean BBQ place. This place has to be the top one or two. The food is amazing. The meat is tender and juicy. The side dishes are delicious. You can ask for refills if you run out. They have excellent deals on drinks during happy hours ( I think it's half of tap beers and house sake). Service is on the slow side, but it's ok. We were busy eating anyways. If you go with a large group, order from the group menu. We had 9 people and we ordered dinner for 6. it was more than enough. The fluffy egg bowl was very good too (i don't remember what it was called). It's located right across the street from Hard Rock Hotel. Check it out. You won't be disappointed.
Food is delicious and the restaurant is very clean. It is really popular, we waited for an hour! By the way, this restaurant is actually far away from the strip!
This place is amazing!   Everything was very very good.  We had the gangnam platter.  It was fantastic

I'm puzzled by all the good reviews of this restaurant. Has nobody in Las Vegas ever had well-prepared Korean food? I was appalled by the meal I was served this evening. It was a graceless, ill-seasoned, flavorless mess. It was as if someone had decided to prepare a "Korean meal" at home, threw  "Asian sauces" on a few vegetables, made a salad, put chunks of cheap raw meat on a board, and served it up with a big hopeful smile.  

I was able to eat the oysters, and there was some tofu thing that wasn't awful, but the rest of it was either offensively nondescript or downright repulsive. Has this place never heard of doenjang?

The surprise hard boiled egg hidden in the salad gave me sufficient energy to get back to my hotel. Otherwise, that was a rather expensive non-meal.

To be clear: this isn't Korean food. This is crudit√©s and cheap raw meat. You could do it at home for $5.
we ordered the Gangnam combo for 6, awesome and huge portions for 8 people! thumbs up !

Staff is super nice. Great staff. I only ordered the brisket (beef tomo, I think). I'm all about the brisket when I go kbbq'ing. I didn't like it. Not to say the quality isn't good, I just like my kbbq brisket to be thin, like 1/2-1/3 of the cut here. Fatty too, the meat here, to me, is pretty lean. Definitely not the type I was expecting. It's more like a slice of steak. I don't know if it's any fault of the food here, but I eat pretty fast and I was in and out in 30 minutes from sitting to exiting. My hotel is half a mile away, I almost didn't make it... Before I even exited the plaza I needed to number two baaaaaaaaad.  I'm so glad I was being lazy and drove l rather than walked. I would of liked to try the Kobe meat as the pictures other posted looks great, but after this close call I think I'll play it safe.  Oh and the cream cheese wontons, I liked!!!

It is a awesome place!
If you like the meat, you will have fabulous time here! 
The beef taste great
The waitress here is so nice to us.
Nice atmosphere and great food. The service was great and the food came out pretty fast. It was pretty busy for a Wednesday so probably you should make reservation on the weekend.

Just got into Vegas for business and we were in need of some good ethnic food. All of my co-workers are Korean (I am the honorary Korean) and they decided on KBBQ. I love KBBQ so the search was on. We landed on this place and decided to give it a shot.

Luckily we stopped in right about 10:00pm on a Tuesday night which meant we were able to take advantage of happy hour. Beef toro was $4 and I think we got 4 orders of this. Honestly, everything was great. The spicy chicken, the creamed corn, the jalape√±o poppers, you name it. But that beef toro? Fantastic. Highly recommend it. Make sure to eat it with some lightly grilled kimchi and sesame oil and you'll be in heaven.

Lastly, service staff was great. Friendly, attentive, and informative.

I definitely recommend this spot.
Fresh BBQ meat; other dishes are also fresh and cooked well. Great service; nice, clean and comfortable restaurant to enjoy dinner with a family.
I went to use the ladies' room and had to wait for a very long time. Finally, the person in the restroom came out and it was a MAN! He was an employee of the restaurant and was not apologetic at all.

We came here with a group of 9 and they were able to get us seated fairly quickly during Happy Hour. There's plenty of options for banchan (side dishes) as well as main BBQ meats and vegetables. They have my favorite tteokbokki and fishcakes. If you check in on Yelp, you receive a free macaroon ice cream sandwich which was nice. I didn't try it but everyone else in the group seem to enjoy theirs. 

The place is clean but a little small, so if you decide to stop by with a large group... make sure to call ahead or you could end up waiting. It's located in a little strip plaza across the street from Hard Rock.
Great food and service! Meat marinated well and many side dishes came with the BbQ. Fun experience too for those who've never cooked Korean BBQ style.

This is really good: very good good and service. Price is reasonable. The pitcher of beer is very large and very full. Anyway, strongly recommend to one who likes meat and drink. We catches happy hour deal, so the drink becomes very attractive in terms of price.
Meat lovers must check out this Korean BBQ place! Very nice servers and big tables! One negative is a long wait with crowd, but I'm sure any popular places have long wait lists....

4th time coming here and i gotta say 
their food is pretty much on point on every dishes that i have ordered here so far. 
just ordered kalbi soup and cant wait till i try'em
come check it out  for ur self whenever u visit vegas!

Awesome, especially during happy hour! Best value meats (everything $4 and under) and unlimited banchan. 

We really liked the bulgogi and pork belly. It was the first time I've tried chicken cheese fondue and that was great too. 

Would definitely come here again. It's off the strip but right next to the Hard Rock and such great value.
The food is delicious and the service was excellent! We are from out of town and we came here since it was close to the airport. It was a good decision!
Best experience of 2015 felt like I was in a amine. Parking sucks though. First time doing something like this it was awesome.

Best meal I had in Vegas this time around.  Not surprised it was listed first.  I don't expect good Korean in Vegas coming from Toronto.  The Banchan was really good and plentiful.  Barely finished the food.  So much variety and all of it above par.  

Meats were of great quality and well marinated.  Oysters were tasty.  Roasted peppers a great addition.

In a city where everything is overpriced for the tourist, this is a deal.

Delicious cuisine and excellent service every time! I eat here at least twice a week. My favorite is coming late since their open until 1am and have a great happy hour menu from 10pm-close. Cocktails are also delicious! I highly recommend for dates, the sexy sophisticated atmosphere and the fact that you can cook your own food while you chat makes for a special experience!!!
Lots of folks love this place.   It's got lots of positive yelp.   I see why.  It was not expensive and the dinner was amazing.

Really good vegetarian kimchi bibimbap. Good service and happy hour prices too. Perfect for a late night run. Right next to Hard Rick Hotel. 

Friends had bulgogi and kalbi and loved it. They like the spicy sauce.

I recommend this place good food and service
Very clean restaurant. Kid friendly my kids enjoyed the place I will be coming back again
Delicious food and great service, definitely recommend this. The premium cuts for 6 was the best decision
The best Korean BBQ ever! I have tired so many korean BBQ restaurants in different countries - this one ranks best ! If you happen to visit LV , you should not miss it !
First time here. The food was good! I would recommend it to others. Got the premium combo. It fed our group of four people. I normally don't have Korean food but I really enjoyed the food here.

Meal was pretty good, though ive had better. Its a good spot to come to for a quick, simple meal. Oysters were great. They have several different options to choose from for different pallets. Overall, good environment and service.

Came to Las Vegas For EDC! Great event by the way. Anyways, it's our last day here and was craving Korean BBQ/Yakiniku. Happy hour is 10pm to closing. Came at 12, instantly got greeted and seated. Service was fast, great and friendly. The happy hour had a variety of good choices. Definitely a must go to restaurant! *****
This is the restaurant that opens late near our hotel. The food and service is good and we were glad that we still have decent food close to mid night.
fantastic?the first time here with frds and we all think the food is amazing???definetely wanna come next time
Great Place. Awesome customer service. Delicious Dinner. Excellent BBQ. I came with my sister. She loves this place and I do too.

Service was excellent. They were very helpful when we asked questions and recommended the Gangnam for 6 people. We were thoroughly satisfied and I recommend if you are looking for a Korean bbq place in Las Vegas.
On vacation here for EDC weekend this was a great dinner to close off our week. The food was great and it was fun cooking my own food.

Some of the meat is pretty good, such as the prime kalbi.  Other meat quality is inconsistent throughout a single plate, especially the pork belly.  Side dishes aren't that impressive.  The corn is bad.  The steamed egg isn't good.  Food wise probably 2-3 stars.

What is horrible is the service and attitude of the servers.  We came for lunch and weren't given lunch special menus.  When I asked for the menu, the attitude started.  We didn't end up ordering the lunch special, but not one smile or happy service for the entire meal.  Each request was met with a grumpy grunt.  They don't refill side dishes without being asked like good korean restaurant experiences.  They don't see a utensil falling to the ground in front of their face and move to address it.  They don't move out of the way when you are trying to walk down the aisle to the restroom.

Terrible service will ruin decent food everytime.

It was great! We would recommend getting separate individual dishes of items you want, comes out  a. It a cheaper than there meals for two options. The star rating is lacking one because the service can be absent at times.
My first time here and so far so good.  Would definitely come back and recommend this plc.
Quick, yummy find in Las Vegas! Ordered bibimbap, steamed egg, and dumpling soup.  Server was pleasant and helpful with questions. Great find.

Service is excellent. This is a self cooking only korean q joint. They have a variety of meat. The meat lacks a little flavor from the normal korean q places. Not a whole variety of the sides you see from a traditional korean place. Enjoyable but not 5 stars.
Love prime kalbi tried filet mignon hirame miso pork toro  but didnt like the hirame miso !

Long wait but it's pretty worth it. 
Great service and food. 

Loved the bacon & scallop!

We had our valentines dinner tonight and everything we ordered was awesome.  Their premium dinner package consisted of high quality meats and seafoods.  My husband enjoyed his seafood ramen and will be ordering it again.  Everybody loved their dinner tonight and we made a good choice in coming here.  We will definitely be back.

The food was really good, the Korean flavour really stood out. The beef was so tender but the pork was the best dish. The sauce was what made it so great. The service was not the best, it was quite slow.
Good place for noodles and fried rice lovers..ordered veggie noodles and fried rice..
Tried prime kalbi and soft tofu soup! Was actually pretty surprised how good they were!  It is definitely one of my favorite asian restaurant in vegas so far!
Amazing food and amazing service! The food is of great quality! We will definitely stop by again whenever we visit Las Vegas.
Best Korean food I've  ever had in America.  10 stars. Very authentic. Seevice fast and friendly.
Finally found a good Korean new place in Las Vegas. Got the Las Vegas bbq meal for 2 and it was splendid.

Great selection of other dishes beside meat. My boyfriend and I were craving Korean BBQ and this place definitely delivered. Good service and awesome variety.

Highly recommend the kalbi and mushroom medley. I came in during happy hour and they had great deals on there too.

Second time visit. The food is so yummy and the environment is enjoyable. As a Asian who likes Korean BBQ a lot, I would say the food here is authentic. We came at around 5pm which is a happy hour surprisingly so we ordered 6 dishes for 2 people. Our favorite one is spicy pork. Would definitely come here again!

It was our first time here, not gonna lie; we were kind of worried. However the Korean Prime Kalbi* sold me over! I don't know what kind of sauce they marinated with but it adds great flavor. Definitely coming back here!

My boyfriend and I walked all the way from the strip just to eat here and it was well worth it! Delicious Korean BBQ!  Great portions for 2. Meat was flavorful and the servers were so respectful and great.  If we live in Las Vegas, we would be here at least once a week!

The food was delicious, probably best Asian bbq I ever had. The service was also very good. But better to call in advance to make sure it's not too busy because I've came few times before and the wait was more than an hour. I will definitely come back next time becuz of the food!!!
Best Korean food I had in a while.  Shrimp with garlic was my favorite, although the Korean spare ribs were also delicious.  You can't go wrong with this place.  Very attentive servers.

The service is very good. Within a few minutes we had some side dishes. The side dishes are very good, especially the cuttlefish fish and fish cake. We also got the meat lovers special. The meat was very good.
Great bugolgi, spicy garlic edamame, banchan, sauces. Recommend the jalape√±o poppers!

Great place. Nice prices during happy hours.  I love their deserts and seafoods.   

Services are great too. I really like the atmosphere. They have great design

Fuck yeah, this was my first time here and it was amazing!
Speedy service, amazing food, great atmosphere

Very attentive staff. Amazing food.
Yummy food I love it. It's almost as good as eating a slice of heaven.

I'm a tourist I came back from Grand Canyon so I was so hungry I looked someplace that opens at midnight. I found this place at the first time I thought here is buffet restaurant like anothor Korean BBQ but it's not. I tried Las vegas set for 2 people I thought it's not enough for me but it is a lot of meal that comes with high quility meet. I was so happy on that night. I will come back agian

Not sure what the hype is all about for Gangnam.  There are significantly better kbbq places in Vegas.  I agree the portions are generous bit the quality just doesn't measure up to other places like Goong, Hobak, or Magal.  Organization was rough as well.  They started being out food and we ended up not having enough room at our table for everything so their solution was to start stacking plates on top of each other so the plates were sitting on top of other food including raw meat.  Although staff was always around our requests for more banchan never seemed to get filled as we had to ask several times.  Came here on the recommendation of someone we know but will be sticking to our preferred places mentioned earlier on this review.
Very good taste and service! Mr. donkey is very friendly. Its the best bbq i have had in vegas. you wont regret!
Place was bomb dot com! Quick and friendly service. We didn't have a reservation but they took care of our party.

Let's be honest here. How many of you gave a 5 star to get free desert?
Sure it's not the worst, I think it's fair to say 3 star in term of food. However in term of service I gave it a zero if I could.
1. Ultra long wait, not because it's crowed. it's just because the people there are not prepare to serve people.
2. The server pretend not to see you raise your hand, even though you do it right in front of her.
3. Talk about happy face, these people look grumpy.
4. I did notice some table get serve better than other.
5. food arrival after order = 1hr. eek!

PS. It should be illegal to bribe people for good review.

One of the best Korean BBQ places I've been to.  Reasonable prices for both combo meals and single items.  Great atmosphere and the staff is attentive and very friendly!  Will definitely be coming back!  We left happy and full!  Plus, those ice cream macaroons are so darn cute and tasty!

I am a Korean and I strongly recommend Korean prime Galbi! It was amazing! 
Also try bulgogi bibimbap. 
I went to this place 3 times in 5 days.

What Was ordered:
Chicken Karaage
Kabocha tempura
Hiramiso Steak 
Korean Prime Kalbi
Fried Dumplings

I went with a group of my friends and we kind of all ordered individual items and shared them. All the items were so good ! Service was great. The side items that came with the meal were super yummy. I want to come back before I leave Vegas.

I was very disappointed. I had high expectations due to the rave reviews. Too much sauce. We hardly finished dinner and had to leave due to bad head from the smoke. Need a better ventilation system. Won't go back. However service was good and that is why I'm giving 3 stars.

This place was AWESOME!!! We usually go to tofu hut and this place was a great change of pace! :) the harami miso was my absolute favorite. The duck was excellent too.

Definitely go during happy hour!
Delicious!! Great bilgogi and side dishes. Get a side of lettuce and wrap the meat in the lettuce and dip into the bean sauce. So good!
The portions are very generous. Ordered Gangnam for two and it easily fed 3 people. Food is good and the servers are attentive.

Very horrible service. We want add something, call waiter about three times. I'm allergic to onion. Order told him "we every food no onions" but still had Onions inside, The waiter like didn't hear.  
We come here for the first time a good time. We order the combo, it's a good deal. This is the second time come here to eat with friends. The same order, of all the food are reduced.
The service also very poor. Two waiters in flirting and chating, didn't listen to the guest's calling. Empty plate on the table and no one clean. I never come again.
Good service, great price and delicious food. We were a party of 6 and ordered 4 portions and could barely finish the food.
We paid for a $15 cab ride to get to this place 40 minutes before they were supposed to close only to be told that their kitchen was already closed.  What a disappointment and waste of money.
Great food, good taste. Gangnam set is enough for 2 people. Service is ok. Sides arrived right away after we finisshed ordering. Kimchi side dish is fabulous.
Food was great! The Las Vegas combo was more then enough for two but if you're still hungry wait for the happy hour to get special deals on extra meat.
The food and service here is great. We got the meat lover combo for 6 along with kobe beef and all 7 of us ate until we were full. Would definitely recommend and come again.
The meat is very good, the service was very friendly, but price and portion size is a little unreasonable but food was pretty good
Excellent food and excellent service recommended. Choice of small portion of Korean BBQ. Happy hour half price on drinks and discounted BBQ meats.

Pretty good food at a decent price. The service is good and the atmosphere pleasant. We ordered the bulgolgi, dumplings, edamame,  and oysters. It was all good. I have had better but for the price it was well worth it.

Outstanding lunch...service excellent...very unique lunch..will come again for sure 
Waitress very friendly and ...extremely helpful with order and very efficient quick service..Her name MAM

Great food, reasonable prices and even better for happy hour.
Got combo for two. A lot of good food.
Did I say, happy hour beer 50% off : )
Drive safe!
Great food. Quick service. Happy hour was on point. Very recommendable place. I would definitely come here again when passing by Las Vegas. Top notch.
Ahhhhmazing!! Food was plentiful, service was on point, and overall I'm stuffed!!! Definitely a place to frequent for all occasions and one of my new favorite spots. Love it!
The Prime Kalbi and the Kobe style beef are delicious. Nice atmosphere and really savory food! Try the mushroom medley!!

Best BBQ in town! The kalbi soup, seafood tofu soup, and the chicken fried rice were the best! Others, like the miso soup, the bulgogi beef, and appetizers were also delicious. The side dishes were tasty as well!

Meat lover is valuable. It's way enough for two adults and one kid. Anyway, you get to cook your own meat. Plus, if you can't eat every thing you can just pack everything you can't eat. The most important thing is that it's delicious!!!

I really like this place for their prime cuts. Everything was just so good from the food to the service. Its worth going a little off the strip for food this good. It's not all you can eat but the portions given is plenty. We ordered the prime selection for a group of 6 guys and barely finished everything. Gangnam Asian BBQ is a must.

The thing about this restaurant is:
Every item on the menu is just very good! The mosh rooms, the crunchy seaweed, the pork, the everything really.
Great customer service, staffs are excellent, place is clean and inviting, easy to find. Many different food selections, lots of food, so be sure to come with an empty stomach.
Harami miso and prime Kalbi were delicious...great quality meat and marinated to perfection. Will definitely come back again.
Excellent service--handled all of my family's spastic requests with grace and a smile. Food was delicious and came in generous portions for a decent price. Would love to come again.

We saw it on Yelp while we're visiting Las Vegas. They have great review. We ordered Meat Lover meal combo. The portion is great and I taste amazing. The only issue we had is long waiting time but it's all worth it.
Gangnam is definitely worth going for a second time! The food is delicious and the price is reasonable. Also you get free desert if you post a review on yelp. I think the owner is very smart.

Pretty good kbbq, with a decent selection of banchan. The meat lovers option is great with good quality meat. 

Only con is that the staff doesn't grill the meat for you, and we had to ask for refills of the sides. Guess I'm just spoiled by LA kbbq.
Yum!!   Really good bbq. Great  service and  reasonable  prices!  Coming back!  Feverish with side dishes.
Great service & great food. Be sure to come for happy hour! My favorite is the bulgogi & spicy pork.
This has been my favorite place to eat in Las Vegas so far. It's best to go with a large group and share. The food was very good and very filling.
Since we discovered this place last month, we ate here 5x already. love the Happy Hour choices. My kids love the Kalbi soup, Sukiyaki noodles. The staff are very friendly also.

Love love love! I had a really hard day, and this was exactly the dining experience I needed to make the day right again. Food was delicious, everything from the appetizers, soup, to the meat bbq; furthermore the atmosphere was relaxed and fun. My new favorite place in Vegas!
Best Korean restaurant I have ever been. Super tasty beef with a fair price. By the way, deliver food in 5 minutes, impressive.
This was my first time here and i really enjoyed it. I got the lunch special and was very happy. Great looking waiters too! Very quality..
It is great Korean style bbq. Good environment, multiple choices.remember come early, otherwise need to wait for the line.
Nice service. It's a cool place. It through me off when I saw we had to cook our food though! It was a fun experience and will come again

Food is FRESH, great service and the cost is very affordable. They have a great selection of items to choose from. We have 3 kids and as you know, kids can be picky eaters. Because they have such a good variety there is something for everyone....even the most picky eaters. All and all, I highly recommend this Dining establishment. Dave Sac CA
Best bbq in town!! Definitely order the prime rib! Tofu soup is also good, sides are delicious too!! Yummy

Friendly and knowledgeable staff were really helpful in getting us situated and recommending delicious items on the menu. 
The two of us ordered three portions of meat, but with all the side dishes, we could have been fine with just two. The bulgogi was our favorite, but make sure you eat that last, as it is the most flavorful. 
They only take reservations of eight people or more, but the two of us only had to wait about twenty minutes to be seated on a Tuesday night. 
It is a long (but doable) walk from the strip. We d have given it 5 stars if they had one more server for slightly faster service and if the kimchi was on point. The other side dishes were very good though, especially the green onions. Yum!
Literally best Korean BBQ in Las Vegas! Worth to try! It's kind of far from Strip, but it also avoid big traffics!
Good bbq .... If you come Las vegas, you should come here for it. Nice space and good service. Love this place
Very good Restaurants!!!!!!! Must come eat when u come Vegas!!!!!!!! Highly recommended!!!!
The bulgogi was amazing! The price was pretty good for the amount of food that was served. The music selection would entertain any customer that walked in.
Got the gangnam package. Waaaaaay too many left overs. Not complaining! Amazing service too, would definitely come back.

Delicious! Favorite was korean prime Kalbi. We also tried prime Kalbi, harami miso, pork toro, pork belly, steamed egg, steamed dumplings, kimchi tofu. Service was prompt. They could have been better with refilling our water and small side dishes. Pork belly was a little tough, but the toro (cheek) was tender. You can always get a free dessert when you submit a Yelp review!

It's the best Korean BBQ ever! Love love kobe style beef cuz u can feel it melting in ur mouth. We tried couple kinds of meat and they were all juicy, tender and full of flavor. The side dishes, salad, appetizers were just nothing to complain. Will definitely come back again!!
Delicious! Fun environment, great price.  Got the meat lovers and it was amazing! Enough for 2 people, but realistically feeds 3 to perfection?

Get their premium combo. Unbelievably delicious. 
We had their kimchi soup as well. Heads up their kimchi stew has tuna instead of pork. Although you could probably ask for pork instead

Food is awesome. I've lived in Korea.  This is authentic bbq complete with sangchu. Go during happy hour 3-6 and get half price drinks and food! My sister and I have eaten here twice for under $40 each time!

This place is pretty money's worth. I enjoyed eating the "meat lover". They gave a lot of meat to the point where we had some left overs and I was forcing myself to eat. The seasoning is delicious for all the meats especially my all time favorite pork meat with the right amount of skin on it.
Hands down the best korean bbq i have had in my city food was great and the customer service was excellent andrew our server treated us like vip's. We will definitely be coming here again.
really good BBQ restaurant?never try this resturant before?everyone should try this? recommd?
Went here for team lunch. We ordered a premium combo for 4. It's good and fed 5 of us full.

We ordered the kalbi, bulgogi, and naeng myun. The meat was marinated well and the side dishes were also tasty. The naeng Myung was cold as it should be but lacked flavor so I ended up added some spices from the side dishes.
Came here with 5 adults and 1 baby. Got the Las Vegas and Gangnam sets and that was more than enough. Good quality meat. Tables too high. Friendly staff.
Best Korean BBQ in Las Vegas! Quality and taste of top meat selections are delicious as well as the sides! Green tea macaroon is to die for! Looking forward to eating here again!
Came here two days in a rOW. Hands dosn best korean food in las vegas. My husband makes me eat pizza allcthe time socit really is a godsnd. Try the kimchi jjigae. It is heaven in a bowl.

Very good foood, must try the pork toro, so tender and juicy when cooked good! And their kimchi is also amazing, mush try. The place takes a lil longer for wait time due to popularity, but nothing sitting at a bar to wait can't help time to fly by faster, some soju and hite is recommended. Back, our server is also really good at accommodating us, not often that we get good service at an Asian restaurant. Food in Vegas is everywhere, but go where you can experience good food, and a unique experience of a Korean BBQ!
Good food, nice place. We have tried various meat and they all taste delicious. The Kobe style beef is really remarkable.
4 people tried the Gangnam Special + Additional Appetizers. $93 bucks for 4 people for lunch was a little pricey. Taste and Service is good. Must try at least once.

We dipped in after a hoops game at UNLV, and considering the rating was so great, we had high expectations. The wait staff was quick and attentive, and the prices were fantastic for the portions/quality of meat! I'm not familiar with the standard in Las Vegas, but this place is up there with those we find anywhere in the Bay Area!

The Korean Prime Kalbi and Korean Chicken Cheese Fondue are so good. Service can be a little slow when busy so be sure to flag sometime down when you need them. When the food gets there, it is so worth the wait.

The spicy calamari is also a tasty choice along with the seaweed salad. 

They give complimentary sides which are nice. We haven't even finished the dinner yet, and can't wait to come back.

I would recommend making a reservation in case it is busy. There are limited tables.

Had the premium combo BBQ. Starters in the combo were good, loved the Kobe beef carpaccio and tuna poki. Also ordered a steamed egg appt, really not that good. Egg is way too solid and over cooked. BBQ meats were overall good quality. Kobe beef was my favorite. 

Wait time was 30-45 mins with 3 groups of 2-3 ppl ahead of us.

Servers were all very nice. 

Good experience overall.

Came here because of the 4.5 star on yelp, but the food actually only deserves a 3 star. It's good, but it's far from anything 4 stars and above.  If you are wondering why this restaurant have so many reviews and high ratings this might answer your question. (See photo) Yes, for every review you write on yelp, you get a free dessert and the server screens your review. "You must show posted review to your server." After seeing the so-called "Limited Time Offer" poster (placed on every table) I felt cheated by yelp. I always use yelp for honest reviews, not reviews that have been somehow influenced and manipulated by the restaurant. It's one thing to give people discounts on their bill if they check-in with yelp, but it's another thing to bribe people with dessert and screen their reviews. My utmost disappointment to the unethical promotional strategy this restaurant uses.  Never coming here again.

Excellent Korean style bbq. Service is friendly and efficient.  All meats were delicious.  I liked it even better than Gen!  $2 for a bowl of rice is a bit ridiculous, but otherwise price is reasonable.  Kids loved it too. Will definitely be back!
Food and service was great here.  Got the gangnam set and the uni bim bim bap, both of which very good!  Will be back for sure...
Best Korean BBQ in Vegas!!!! A Must in Vegas for all the the people from SoCal and the Bay Area! Happy Hour is the Best!!!!! You will not be disappointed!!!
Good food. I'm been here few times but today, the service seems slow. Either way, I like it here!
Great food!!!! Glad that we did'nt go to another buffet place. Friendly staff and very goood service. :) we'll definitely go back here next time we come visit vegas. :))
Great food for a great price open late! And happy hour from 11 to 1am! Very close to the Hard Rock Hotel where we are staying very convenient
Grill your own meat places don't excite me but this one got my attention due to quality and service.  Don't be fooled - it's a lot of food for two people!!!  The price - you can't beat it.
The bibimbap was delicious! Great atmosphere. We came in at lunch time and were seated fairly quickly.  We will have to come back again to try the other dishes!
Delicious meal! The Korean prime kalbi was delicious, as were all of the sides and the bibimbap. Tons of food for under $15 each and good service. I highly recommend!
Got great food and it came very quickly! Good atmosphere, will definitely come back in the future.
The food here is really good. We order a #1 set for two. The meat are very delicious and I think is enough for three. I also recommend Uni bimbambamp.

Love this place . The Kobe beef so delicious . The overall quality meat is A. Service great and price point is reasonable and comparable to the dish portion they serve . Anybody love Korean BBQ and visit LV should try . Won't be sorry ...

Amazing Korean bbq. Definitely worth trying if you're in doubt. Place is a bit small but once you're seated, service is fast. I ordered the premium set and it was somewhat on the pricier side but it was great!

1st time dining at Gangnam, and the service is fast and attentive. The quality of food are top notch. Harami cut is flavorful.  Other cuts are excellent too. They would bring anything we ask right away. We will definitely come back again.

Great food and amazing service. This was our first time coming here and the atmosphere was wonderful. There was no smoke, beautiful decorations, and big portions. Every single dish/appetizer was ordered was flavorful and enjoyable. Definitely coming here again. 10/10 would recommend.

Come here during happy hour this is he best Japanese bbq!!! From the happy hour menu the bulgogi is AMAZING followed by the spicy pork! Can't beat the 8$ pitcher of sapporo;) the jalape√±o poppers are great to start of with :)
This was a great experience , the food was outstanding and I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone seeking Korean BBQ - 5 stars from me
Gangnam is on point lots of meat and great flavor... sides are ok but the bulgogi bibmbop is fire.
The best Korean BBQ restaurant I have ever had! Dobulgi is one of the must try item! The meat are fresh and appetizer are perfect. But the service is poor
Good place to eat before the unlv basketball game. Close to the Mack and s good meeting spot.

Ever since my family's favorite Asian bbq closed down my family has been looking for another good place. This place is amazing. The food is very good and the service is very nice. I will be coming here again.

My second time here and it's still amazing! The service is great and the food is even better. We tried there happy hour and spent 40 bucks for 3 people and still had food leftover. Goto spot for vegas hands down.
Had the Gangnam combo, really good highly recommended. It was more than enough to feed us. Would definitely come back!

I love a good Korean BBQ, you really never know when you will find good quality food, This wasn't bad but it wasn't great, it was average. The prices were not ridiculous like many other all you can eat Korean BBQ are. The sides were good, the meats were tender but a little in the flavorless side. Clean establishment and good enough  service! We order the meat lover special! It had 5 kind of meats, salad, miso soup, rice and the spicy steam dumpling. In the other side we did enjoy dessert, good ice cream macaroon.

I love this place! By far one of my favorite Korean bbq places ever! The meats are always fresh and the accompanying side dishes are delicious. I usually get their Gangnam package. The package for two is more than enough for two people to share. This place never disappoints! I make it a point to visit whenever I am in town.

We had one of almost everything on the menu. The duck was more on point than Steph Curry during the NBA finals. The pork belly, more filling than Boston Cream. The broccoli fondue, cheesier than this Yelp review. Do yourself a favor, get off the strip, almost burn your hand on a grill, and enjoy some great Korean BBQ.
Great and attentive staff. Wide range of variety at a good price! Yuzu soju is amazing!

Don't let the 4000+ reviews fool you; the only reason Gangnam has this many reviews is because they hand out free desserts when customers show them completed yelp reviews, and they are undoubtedly skewed high as no dogs bite the hands that feed them.  This restaurant lags far behind other Korean BBQ joints in New York and Los Angeles particularly in terms of service, and while the food was solid it was by no means outstanding.

Food:
We ordered the steamed egg which was way overcooked.  The BBQ dishes were decent however and the portions are all solid given the price.  The japchae was also on point.  

Service:
Nothing against the waiters as service was prompt, but the level of service was just not up to par for a Korean BBQ restaurant.  At the other restaurants I've been to servers cook the food for the customers, not to mention that beef and pork dishes are cooked on different specialized grill tops.  Once the meats are cooked the servers will slice them into bite-sized morsels.  Gangnam leaves the customers to do all of this on their own, and throughout dinner there was only one grill top which no one bothered to switch out even after the top was charred black.  The fan above the grill was also either off or not very strong so smoke was everywhere.
First time eating here and I enjoyed the experience. Our server Jin was super nice and took us step by step in the process. Recommend it! Loved everything.
It's our first time to try this kind of restaurant and we're all satisfied...Food are great.. I recommend this place..
the prime kalbi and pork belly are really good. Waitresses are friendly and helpful as well.

The Bbq food was quality and plentiful. Selected the premium. The oysters and tuna poki along with various cuts of meat added another star compared to other bbq places. The wait time on Monday night was approximately 20 minutes, but once got seated, food items came quickly. The one missing star was for not having Asahi black for the evening. Overall food was good compared to So Cal and bay area Bbq.
Gangnam set meal is great! Get the bulgogi bibimbap. Avoid the steamed egg.  Solid Korean BBQ close to the strip.
Good food! been there yesterday....if you are hungry its perfect for you
Excellent food and excellent service! Especially the bibimbop was really great!! We really enjoyed!!!

Very good service and delicious food overall 
It will be a nice meal for family and friends

We ordered Premium combo for two people. I must say everything is PERFECT especially the KOBE beef and the shrimp bibimbap! We really enjoyed the late lunch after whole day hiking. They also have the promotion if u rate them, they will offer free dessert :)
Good meat quality! Service could be better but was still okay. Should check out if your in the area

Good quality food. Servers were very nice. 

Chicken with cheese was interesting. Definitely a new concept to me. Very good though

The best Korean BBQ I've had in Las Vegas!!!! Great quality meats and appetizers. We ordered the beef, pork, Kalbi and then the noodles sukiyaki. I would go back and recommend this places to everyone coming to Vegas.
Awesome Korean bbq! Tons of food, great atmosphere and free macaroon dessert if you check in with Yelp!
A little pricey since it's in a tourist-frequented area but it's really good food. They marinate all the meat which makes it more flavorful than some other Korean BBQ places.

Good kimchee, though some were a little sweet for me. Good quality meats! Tongue was great! Wish the Bulgogi and Spicy Pork were cut into larger slices. The Japanese peppers were a bit too spicy. I prefer the more mild ones.  Not bad overall.

Cute and convenient place for any college student who dorms at UNLV that crave Korean BBQ, it's just across the campus. Friendly staff, our waitress continuously check up on us asking if we were okay. The quality of the food was great and the desserts was very appealing. Plus if you rate them on YELP you get a free dessert! (Saves you about $4-$7!)
Great fantastic Loren food. The place we must come every time we are in Las Vegas. Get a seat in advance if possible, because it is so popular! I love it!

Fabulous service! Tons of food, reasonable prices. Yelp review earns you a free dessert :)  

We ordered the Gangnam meal for two and we are stuffed!! Only enough room for dessert ;) 

The food was good. I didn't give 5 stars cuz it wasn't eyes-rolling-back-in-your-head good, but it definitely was yummy :) 

Would recommend!
Excellent services and very good food. Highly recommend it! I had the Kobe beef and it is to die for. Came from SF Bay Area. We got lots of Korean restaurants but this really a gem.
We two ordered "meat lover" set ,and the beef and side dishes were very delicious. A must-eat restaurant in Vegas.

Had such a horrible experience tonight. My family and I had dinner and barely finishing our dessert when the server asked us to hurry things up as there was a reservation at 9pm. This is so awfully rude to ask customers to leave. This is a family night out dinner. Highly disappointed and discourage anyone to even try this place and experience this rudeness.

Not expecting such a long wait for a Wednesday night, but apparently this place is popular!  The servers were helpful in choosing from the menu. Ordered the original bibimbap, squash tempura, and flat iron garlic and bacon wrapped scallops for the grill. You MUST order the scallops!!!! So delicious!  Everything else was tasty, too.

Atmosphere was great, people are having a good time, the place is super clean, music is fun. Great spot for family meal, catching up with friends, or an adventure in grilling your own food!

Did I mention the servers were fantastic?? Jihoon took great care of us tonight.
Came here the first time for its good rating. We ordered the Gangnam grill for two. Both the food and the service is excellent. Definitely recommend.
Good meat. Long queue. Free dessert. Generallyvgood although we took a long walk here.
The beef quality is pretty decent. Some tapas are better than Gyu Kaku. The banana tempura is great!
Super yummy and supper fun. Visiting for the weekend and decided to try it based on high reviews. Really glad we stopped in.
The food here is delicious! Although the food portions are small, the flavor and amount makes up for it. In addition, the restaurant has attentive service and a beautiful, modern-asian ambiance. :D

Tourists and locals: save your money and go somewhere in China town. It's easy to find a place with the same or better food with the same atmosphere for way cheaper. 
Food was average and the service was less then average.
Great food, fast service. Excellent waiter. Thanks Pack for serving us. We absolutely going to come back.

Our table ordered the gangnam combo for 6 and it was delicious. The meats were all very tender and well marinated and the side dishes were good as well. They even let you pick between white rice and bibimbab for the rice option. It was definitely a worthwhile visit.
We order the gangnam bbq for two, the kobe beef with prepared sauce is my favorite. Also like the banana tempura, very special
This restaurant was delicious, amazing Korean BBQ! It definitely hit the spot, it was a very clean restaurant and nice staff.
Food is good and high quality. Must try Kobe beef and short ribs! They are awesome! Service is really good as well. We asked them to refill side dishes and change grills and they're responsive.

Pretty ok. Ordered the beef toro which is just a fancy way of saying cha dol. galbi and Kobe beef. All just ok. But really doing this review for the free macaron ice cream!!! The coffee macaron was so good.

I'm from Los Angeles but every time I visit Las Vegas I go straight to Gangnam BBQ. 
The meat selection is the best I've ever tried. Combinations are really worthy. Great customer service, someone is always near by to help you. Nice interior & K-pop music.
If you are thinking about bbq in Las Vegas - Gangnam is the best place all over the town.
deliiiiiiiiiiiiiiicious?Best Korean restaurant I had in Las Vegas. Oyster so fresh. Mushroom testes great. Calamari sooo good.

Amazing place, the meat is so tender, and the vegetables are delicious. I would recommend getting TWO or Even THREE orders of the mushroom medley, it's spectacular, you won't get enough. Definitely coming back here again on my next trip to Vegas.

Ordered Harami Miso, Korean Prime Kalbi, Bulgogi, and Spicy Chicken with lemon sauce. The Kalbi was my favorite. 

Service is a tad slow and frustrating because there are only 4 tables being waited on. 

Restaurant's ambiance is lovely.

This place is sooo good! We got the Las Vegas grill and it was delicious! Andrew was really nice. It was our 1st time here and he cooked for us and told us all about the different dishes. I'd highly recommend this place!

Definitely my go-to Korean BBQ restaurant here around Las Vegas. As a party of 4, we ordered the Gangnam package for 2 and the additional portions on the front pages of the menu. My most favorite meat is ultimately the Korean BBQ beef!
Really enjoyed all the various meats, especially the spicy pork, it was yummy. The banchan was great as well. I was quite impressed with the kimchi, had a great flavor to it, made just right.
If you're getting tired of Vegas's buffet. Come here for something different.  Great foods, good service, lots of items to choose from.
Yummy food. Decent prices. Staff could maybe be a little bit nicer? :) I would go back though. We were super full.

Wasn't sure how to start but our waitress explained everything and it was all really good. Service was poor. Waitress took our order and never came back. No refills, no check on us, we had to flag anyone down that we could.

Read the reviews, don't go by quantity..  They offer a free dessert for a Yelp review. I got mine for this one.

Awesome food. 
Great service. 
The harami miso, Korean chicken and pork belly are my favorites.

Nice and authentic BBQ, good price, good service!
If you want to try korean BBQ in Las vegas, I think This is the place to go.
Service started out a little slow but that changed after we were finally able to get our order placed. Food was terrific...all of it!

The meat are delicious and the portions are great. The services are great. The servers are very attentive and friendly. The ambiance is very mellow and relaxing. Love the music that they play as well.

We came here for dinner. It took about 20 minutes for waiting. But it is totally worth it! We ordered the meat lover for 2 and that is well enough for us! The beef are all sooo good! You don't wanna miss this place if you are looking for Asian bbq in Lv!

2nd time back to this place..  it did not disappoint again!  This time I came back with 5 friends and we had the 2-person portion of the meat lovers and the gang nam and it was perfect portioning for all of us. Highly recommend this place.  Atmosphere and food was great!
Awesome experience. The meat was so tasty. Spicy pork is da BOMB!  Service was great as well.
I love eating korean bbq and this place is great! You get a lot of food for the price and the marinated meats are on point! Services was spectacular as well!

The food was great.  We ordered the "Premium choice for 2."  Highly recommended.  We loved the macaroons ice cream.  The restaurant is little small but it was worth the wait.  Wish there was a restaurant like this in Houston.

OMG this is the best Korean bbq I have had in Vegas! Our waiter was very helpful and gave awesome recommendations and the happy hour was so good! I would definitely come back to this place every time I visit vegas.
This was my first time eating Korean BBQ. The food was delicious and everone was helpful, patient and polite. I would definitely recommend this place to family and friends.

Great food, great service. Please make a trip here while your in Vegas..
John the Manager gave great service.

I came to eat here in a party of four. We did the "meat lovers". It was a very good deal. The food was plenty to split between the four of us, maybe even a little too much. This along with all the sides definitely filled us all up. Very clean restaurant and I like the ambiance. Also like how every person gets their own tongs.
